text: Alan Joel Greiman (December 29, 1931 – February 14, 2022) was an American lawyer and politician. He was born in Chicago, Illinois. He practiced law in Skokie, Illinois. Greiman was in the Illinois House of Representatives from 1972 to 1987 and was a Democrat.'Illinois Blue Book 1985–1986,' Biographical Sketch of Alan J. Greiman, pg. 64 Greiman died on February 14, 2022, at the age of 90. ==References== Category:1931 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Politicians from Chicago Category:People from Skokie, Illinois Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:Lawyers from Chicago Category:American judges Category:State legislators of the United States
title: Alan J. Greiman
